name: KATJEPULT
description:
❤ Pss Pss Please Support Independent Artists ❤ ABOUT

A hand embroided little game about a katje sailing on an unknown adventure. Made in 48 hours for the Women Game Jam 2021. 

Embroidy made entirely by @ceceedraws. This was Camille's first ever game jam. Is this the first ever hand embroided game? Meow meow meow.

CONTROLS

Spacebar to katje.

THEME

Sailing Through Unknown Waters.

DIVERSIFIERS HIT

Only one button - Spacebar!
Game based on an artistic movement - Embroidery!
Limits? They don't exist - your game can be played on your computer and phone.
No Idiom - The game can be played by any person, independent of their language.

CREDITS

freesound.org - Migfus20, Kodack, steaq
